block.kmonsters.ancient_turnip_block.des: §9Put on top of a Waste Block, surrounded by Red Candles to summon a§c Flesh Golem§9!
block.kmonsters.card_cutter.description_: §9Can be used to enhance Soul cards
§9Also can "cut" Soul Cards in exchange of exp
block.kmonsters.carved_turnip.descriptio: §9Can be put on Clay, on Terracota to summon a §cClayspawn
block.kmonsters.cursed_campfire.descript: §9Does not provide light or cook food
block.kmonsters.cursed_container.descrip: §9Each time will cost 10 more exp levels
block.kmonsters.cursed_converter.descrip: §9Transforms Diamond Ores below it into §cCursed Diamond Ores
block.kmonsters.cursed_diamond_ore.descr: §9It is created using a Cursed Converter
block.kmonsters.deepslate_cursed_diamond: §9It is created using a Cursed Converter
block.kmonsters.ectoplasm_block.descript: §9Gets perturbated when colliding with a non sneaking mob
§9When not perturbated, items will be attracted to the center of the block
§9When perturbated, items will bounce of the block
§9Will remain perturbated if conected to a Redstone signal
block.kmonsters.frisp_skull.description_: §9Use a §cMonster Heart §9on it to summon another Frisp
§9Use a §bFrozen Bone §9on it to deal §bfreezing §9damage to nearby mobs at full HP
block.kmonsters.mist_machine.description: §9On top of a Rune Block creates bigger Mist
block.kmonsters.mystic_rune_block.descri: §9Teleports to Y position that can see the sky, but damages you
block.kmonsters.poltergeist.description_: §9Generates Spirit particles at low light level
block.kmonsters.sculk_vampire_artifact.d: §9Use §4Cursed Diamonds §9to enchant tools/armor with extra enchantments
block.kmonsters.unestable_rock.descripti: §9Walking on it will break the block
block.kmonsters.vampire_artifact.descrip: §9Can be upgraded if it is on a Mystic Rune Block
§9If upgraded, will also turn Silverfish into Exp and will not turn blocks into waste
death.attack.dire_hit.item: %1$s was cut in half by %2$s wielding %3$s
death.attack.dire_hit.player: %1$s was cut in half whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.mirrored_damage.player: %1$s attack was mirrored whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.nightmare.item: %1$s was engulfed by darkness by %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.nightmare.player: %1$s was engulfed by darkness whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.spike_damage.player: %1$s was impaled on spikes whilst trying to escape %2$s
gamerule.advancedMonsterSpawnChance.desc: Stronger monsters will spawn around 20+ (by default) exp level players, set to 0 to disable
gamerule.batsTurnIntoVampires.descriptio: If true, nearby mobs with the Halloween effect will transform nearby Bats into Vampires
gamerule.doHalloweenNightmare.descriptio: There is a chance of getting the Halloween effect when sleeping
gamerule.minimumAdvancedMonsterSpawnLeve: At which Player level Advanced Monsters will spawn
gamerule.undeadInflicHalloween.descripti: Normal undead mobs have a chance of inflicting the Halloween effect
gui.kmonsters.card_cutter_gui.tooltip_cu: Cutting a Soul Card provides Exp, but resets the card
gui.kmonsters.card_cutter_gui.tooltip_en: Enhance the Soul Cards with Cruorum/Sculk/Runic apples
gui.kmonsters.flesh_golem_gui.tooltip_fi: First slot if for Soul Cards
Third slot is for food for the golem (Rotten Flesh, Waste...)
gui.kmonsters.flesh_golem_gui.tooltip_se: Second slot is for Mossy Waste/Flesh Golem Armor
item.kmonsters.card_sword.description_2: §9Has a small chance of dropping Soul Card Pieces when killing mobs

§9Can also be used in a Card Cutter to boost a Soul Card

§9The more Cruorum armor pieces, the more damage is negated

item.kmonsters.lootbox.description_1: §9Loot depends on some Advancements the player has

item.kmonsters.nastiest_meal.description: §9Only the bravest ones dare to try it...
item.kmonsters.ominous_totem.description: §9When in  hand, it will boost nearby tamed mobs
§9The boost increases if wielder has §6Halloween §9and/or §8Deadly Omen §9effects
item.kmonsters.pentagram.description_0: §9Right click an entity to give it §6Halloween §9and summon Rotten Arms
item.kmonsters.runic_apple.description_0: §9Fed it to a Tamed mob to increase their Dire Hit
item.kmonsters.runic_apple.description_2: §9Can also be used in a Card Cutter to boost a Soul Card
item.kmonsters.runic_cloak_chestplate.de: §9Use Double Jump button (default SPACE) to jump in the air
§9Double Jump can be used while riding Horses too!
item.kmonsters.runic_vampire_armor_boots: §9Full armor will block attacks in exchange of §cMonster Hearts

item.kmonsters.sculk_heart_piece.descrip: §9Rarely dropped by mining Sculk related blocks
item.kmonsters.sludge_bucket.description: §9Other mobs will sink into the Sludge
item.kmonsters.stabilized_bone_meal.desc: §9Right click breaks ONLY nearby leaves and grass
item.kmonsters.stone_whip.description_1: §9Does not deal damage but creates Stone in a line
item.kmonsters.wicked_kodachi.descriptio: §9Can consume Pentagrams, summoning more Rotten Arms
